results.definition: link with or as with a yoke
two items of the same kind
a connection (like a clamp or vise) between two things so they move together

examples: under the yoke of a tyrant
they threw off the yoke of domination

results.definition: a pair of draft animals joined by a yoke
examples: pulled by a yoke of oxen

results.definition: fabric comprising a fitted part at the top of a garment
put a yoke on or join with a yoke
stable gear that joins two draft animals at the neck so they can work together as a team
support consisting of a wooden frame across the shoulders that enables a person to carry buckets hanging from each end
